name: fuck you evil!
description:
silly game that took far too long to make for what it really is

features:

throw ducks!
kill ceos!
sensory overload!
it's all too much!
the end of the world!
nobody can do anything about it except all the rich people but they don't care!

controls:

duck (click)
jump (space)

this game contains a bit that might feel overwhelming and scary so maybe dont play if you're not in that headspace right now 💜
